answers.answer: Hi!Usually people gain weight while on depot shots. If you are losing weight, then it is best to understand why—do you have PCOD. If yes, then the shots can aggravate it and cause diabetes like situation which can make you lose weight. Hyperthyroidism, severe acidity due to shots affecting digestion, and IBS and other such related syndromes, worms in stool could all be the cause. So, if you are losing weight, these conditions should be ruled out.Take care!
